title: Mathematics
description: Explore essential math topics including algebra, geometry, fractions, and decimals.

title: English Language
description: Improve grammar, vocabulary, reading comprehension, and sentence structure.

title: Science
description: Learn about biology, ecosystems, the human body, and scientific thinking.

title: History
description: Explore the ancient civilizations of Egypt, Mesopotamia, Greece, and Rome.

title: Geography
description: Understand continents, countries, capitals, maps, and natural environments.

title: Computer Science
description: Discover the basics of hardware, binary systems, and logical thinking.

title: Financial Literacy
description: Learn the essentials of budgeting, saving, and managing money responsibly.

title: Digital Citizenship
description: Understand online safety, responsible tech use, and digital ethics.

title: Art and Creativity
description: Develop creative skills through drawing, painting, and design principles.

title: Health and Wellbeing
description: Explore nutrition, mental wellness, fitness, and personal growth.
